text:
[Verse]
We glide through the night
Under stars so bright
Feet moving in time
To the beat in our minds

[Verse 2]
Shadows dance with us
No need for a fuss
Just me and you
In the soft moon hue

[Chorus]
Dance in the moonlight
Feel our hearts take flight
Dance until the dawn
When the night is gone

[Verse 3]
Whispers in the air
Wind plays with your hair
Laughter fills the space
In this magic place

[Chorus]
Dance in the moonlight
Feel our hearts take flight
Dance until the dawn
When the night is gone

[Bridge]
Night sky is our stage
Turn a brand new page
Spinning hand in hand
In this dreamland
title: Dance in the Moonlight
